name: The Jumpless Room
description:
The first game I ever made.

I made this for a game jam, Ludum Dare 49 specifically.

It was my first finished project, and I was honestly fairly proud of it. It's nothing special, but it's what kickstarted me developing games. Uploaded here for all to see where I started out.

The game can be beaten very quickly, it has 7 levels of progressive difficulty, although the final level is a big step up compared to those that come before it, and it introduces new mechanics that, if I had the time, i would've introduced in their own levels.
